caption: One man with crush is talking with a woman who wears a shiny yellow outfit. They talk for a while, and when he is going to leave, he sees a man on the roof of a house. After he arrive his home, he receives many emails, he hesitates for a while, and finally take a car to go to another place to meet with his friend. His friend asks him to use his cellphone to do something. And he is surprised to see a pink suitcase, which is found by his friend in a trash pile. And finally, they receive a call from somebody on the phone.
